Margin classes

You can adjust the indentation of the item through classes: marginX. The available classes in the range from 10 to 100 with step 10. To clean margin for element use classes no-margin*.

margin20
margin40
margin60

no-margin
no-margin-left
no-margin-right
no-margin-top
no-margin-bottom

Padding classes

You can adjust the padding inside the element through classes: paddingX. The available classes in the range from 10 to 100 with step 10. To clean padding for element use classes no-padding*.


padding10
padding20
padding30


no-padding
no-padding-left
no-padding-right
no-padding-top
no-padding-bottom
